variables.name: mDelegateView
variables.comment: * View that should receive forwarded touch events

variables.name: mTargetBounds
variables.comment:
* Bounds in local coordinates of the containing view that should be mapped to the delegate
         * view. This rect is used for initial hit testing.

variables.name: mActualBounds
variables.comment:
* Bounds in local coordinates of the containing view that are actual bounds of the delegate
         * view. This rect is used for event coordinate mapping.

variables.name: mSlopBounds
variables.comment:
* mTargetBounds inflated to include some slop. This rect is to track whether the motion events
         * should be considered to be be within the delegate view.

variables.name: mDelegateTargeted
variables.comment: * True if the delegate had been targeted on a down event (intersected mTargetBounds).

methods.name: public void setBounds(Rect desiredBounds, Rect actualBounds)

methodNames: public void setBounds(Rect desiredBounds, Rect actualBounds)
